item.title: Auth Contract
item.description: Auth keeps a permission (uint8) for any account (address). item.title: Combiner Contracts
item.description: The Combiner contracts are the most dynamic. In fact, they can even be written and deployed by a third party. Their job is to capture responses from miners, deliver rewards to good actors, and come to a consensus.
